text: "You & I" is a 2014 song by English-Irish boy band One Direction and is the fourth and final single from their third studio album Midnight Memories (2013). It went to number 7 in Ireland, number 13 in Spain, number 17 in Belgium (Flanders), number 19 in the United Kingdom, number 20 in Belgium (Wallonia) and Italy, number 21 in Sweden, number 22 in New Zealand, number 23 in Australia and Switzerland, number 32 in the Netherlands, number 68 in the United States and number 78 in Canada. Category:2014 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:One Direction songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Rock ballads
title: You & I (One Direction song)
